p: IR was induced according to a method described previously [ 7, 14]. FL83B cells were seeded in 10 cm dishes and incubated at 37°C for 48 h to reach 80% confluences. Serum-free medium containing recombinant mouse TNF- α and different RTL fractions (25 μg/ml) was incubated for 16 h at 37°C to induce IR.
